mapper.insert: INSERT INTO takeaway (memo, takeaway, vaild, printed, source, delivery, delivery_timestamp) VALUES (#{memo}, #{takeaway}, #{vaild}, #{printed}, #{source}, #{delivery}, #{deliveryTimestamp})
mapper.update:
UPDATE takeaway SET
memo=#{memo},
takeaway=#{takeaway},
vaild=#{vaild},
printed=#{printed},
source=#{source},
delivery=#{delivery},
delivery_timestamp=#{deliveryTimestamp},
updated=now() WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(o.COUNT* p.product_price) AS total, tn.id AS turnover_id, tn.discount, tn.checkout, tn.payment, ta.memo, ta.takeaway, ta.created, ta.id, ta.vaild, ta.printed, ta.source, ta.delivery, ta.delivery_timestamp, ta.updated FROM turnover tn LEFT JOIN `order` o ON o.turnover_id = tn.id LEFT JOIN product p ON o.product_id = p.id, takeaway ta WHERE ta.created BETWEEN #{from} AND #{to} AND tn.takeaway_id = ta.id GROUP BY ta.id ORDER BY ta.created DESC ;

SELECT tor.id as turnover_id, tor.checkout, tor.takeaway_id, tor.discount, tor.payment, ta.created,ta.memo,ta.takeaway,ta.id, ta.vaild, ta.printed, ta.source, ta.delivery, ta.delivery_timestamp, ta.updated FROM takeaway ta, turnover tor WHERE ta.id=tor.takeaway_id AND ta.id=#{id};
